definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: Uighurs with disciplinary problems or criminal offenses are treated leniently , they say.
sentences.chinese: 他们说，政府对违法犯罪的维吾尔族人进行宽大处理。

sentences.english: But even they weren't able to stop vigilante group of Han Chinese attacking Uigur men.
sentences.chinese: 然而，他们也不能阻止汉族义警组织袭击维吾尔族人。

sentences.english: With regard to the ethnic Uighur sources, different opinions.
sentences.chinese: 关于维吾尔族的族源，说法不一。

sentences.english: The dough-twist style plaits are a symbol of Uygur girls.
sentences.chinese: 麻花辫子几乎是维吾尔族姑娘的象征了。

sentences.english: This mutant is reported in Uygur nationality for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 维吾尔族中的这种突变型系首次报道。

sentences.english: The Uigur minority miss of the beauty amiability kind and genial and good young man.
sentences.chinese: 美丽可爱的维吾尔族姑娘和善良的小伙子。

sentences.english: Naan is the most favorite staple food for Uyghur people.
sentences.chinese: 馕是维吾尔族人最喜欢的主食。

sentences.english: Uygur well-known agronomist with good Gong "Nongsang summary of food and clothing."
sentences.chinese: 著名维吾尔族农学家鲁明善著有《农桑衣食撮要》。

sentences.english: Han Jia, you know quite a lot about our Uygur houses.
sentences.chinese: 韩佳，你对我们维吾尔族民居了解得真不少。

definition: abbr. for 維吾爾族|维吾尔族, Uighur (Uyghur) ethnic group of Xinjiang
Russian ethnic group (of northeast China and Xinjiang etc)/Russian nationality/Russians (of Russia)
Mongol ethnic group of north China and Inner Mongolia
Tajik ethnic group/Tajikistan, former Soviet republic adjoining Xinjiang and Afghanistan
Salar ethnic group of Qinghai province
